page.title: 01LYME REGIS IN BRIEF
page.content:
Lyme Regis - a small seaside town popular as a holiday resort and place of retirement for the elderly.
Attractions - Safe beaches,historic harbour and buildings,yachting,power- boating,windsurfing,fossil hunting, magnificent views and scenery.
Industry - mainly service industries for holiday makers and the elderly. Some light industry is being encouraged as well as rural crafts.A few inshore trawlers operate from the Cobb,as do mackerel boats for visitors in the summer.These boats are also used to lay pots for crabs and, occasionally,lobster.
Detraction - see entry under Lyme Regis Sewage Problem.
